name: Super Shade Shift
description:
Super Shade Shift is a casual game where the player has to absorb coloured spheres to collect points to go for the highscore.

You can choose different game modes to test your skill and try different challenges.
Tip: I highly recommend the task mode.

Super Shade Shift was developed as an experiment to test out a simple game idea, and to learn about the basics of game design.
